title: Network data transfer testing pipeline parameters

input_output_options.title: Input/output options
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to storage on Cloud infrastructure.

bigfilesize.description: Size of large file. Can use units such as MB, GB, etc.

bigfilecount.description: Number of large files to create

smallfilesize.description: Size of small files. Can use units such as MB, GB, etc.

smallfilecount.description: Number of small files to create
